T02D3572:203a-1: aashta bhu dza ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
T02D3572:203a-3: rigs byed ma phyag brgyad ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3572:203a-4: rigs byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3572:203a-5: sngon du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa bsgoms
T02D3572:203a-6: nas ram yi g-yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma
T02D3572:203a-7: la hr'i:yig spro ba dang bsdu pa'i skur bsgoms nas
T02D3572:203a-8: / de yongs su gyur pa las skad cig gis
T02D3572:203a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma ku ru kulle phyag brgyad ma
T02D3572:203a-10: / / sku mdog dmar mo padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang /
T02D3572:203b-0: nyi ma la rdo rje skyil @203b krung gis bzhugs
T02D3572:203b-1: pa gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gnas shing phyag
T02D3572:203b-2: dang po gnyis kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D3572:203b-3: rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //
T02D3572:203b-4: g-yas kyis phyag lhag ma rnams kyis lcags kyu dang rna pa'i rtsar mda' 'gengs pa dang /
T02D3572:203b-5: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya bsnams pa'o//
T02D3572:203b-6: g-yon gyi phyag lhag ma rnams kyis zhags pa dang /
T02D3572:203b-9: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3572:203b-10: shar gyi 'dab mar rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma'o //
T02D3572:203b-11: lho'i 'dab mar rdzogs pa'i sgrol ma'o //
T02D3572:203b-12: nub kyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'i sgrol ma'o//
T02D3572:203b-13: byang gi 'dab mar rna ba'i sgrol ma'o //
T02D3572:203b-14: dbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la tsunda'o //
T02D3572:203b-15: me'i 'dab ma la gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o //
T02D3572:203b-16: bden bral gyi 'dab ma la mar me'i sgrol ma'o //
T02D3572:203b-17: rlung gi 'dab ma la goo r'i'i sgrol ma rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3572:203b-18: de rnams thams cad kyang sku mdog ser mo de
T02D3572:203b-19: bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu rgyan can rdo rje skyil
T02D3572:203b-21: phyag g-yas pa dag gis mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D3572:203b-23: phyag g-yon pa dag gi sa autpal dang /
T02D3572:203b-25: shar gyi sgor rdo rje ro langs ma 'jigs shing
T02D3572:203b-26: lto ba'i phyang ba sku mdog dmar mo mi bskyod
T02D3572:203b-28: phyag g-yas pa dag gis sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D3572:203b-30: phyag g-yon pa dag gis dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3572:203b-31: lho'i sgor gzhan gyis mi thub ma sku mdog ser mo rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3572:203b-32: phyag g-yas pa dag gis dbyug pa dang /
T02D3572:203b-34: phyag g-yon pa dag gis dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3572:203b-35: nub kyi sgor ral pa gcig ma mdog nag mo skra gyen du brdzes shing lto ba 'phyang ba //
T02D3572:203b-36: mche ba gtsigs shing mchu bsdams pa /
T02D3572:203b-37: 'do dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3572:203b-38: phyag g-yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D3572:203b-39: phyag g-yon pa dag gis dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3572:203b-40: byang sgor rdo rje gandha r'i sku mdog gser ljang
T02D3572:203b-41: gu lta bu don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa
T02D3572:204a-1: phyag g-yas pa dag gis kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D3572:204a-3: phyag g-yon ga dag gis dral bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3572:204a-4: bzhi po 'di rnams zhags g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02D3572:204a-5: de la 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
T02D3572:204a-6: pa'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis rgyab sbyar nas
T02D3572:204a-7: ming gnyis mdud pa byas pa ste //
T02D3572:204a-8: mthe'u chung dang gung mo mthe ba chen gyis bsdams
T02D3572:204a-9: nas mdzub mo lcags kyu'i rnam pas 'gying zhing dpral
T02D3572:204a-10: ba'i phyogs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02D3572:204a-11: bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3572:204a-12: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:sv'a h'a /
T02D3572:204a-13: khri bzlas pas skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3572:204a-16: autpal la mar dang sbrang bsres shing aa shvadtha'i yam
T02D3572:204a-17: shing gis sbyin sreg byas pas 'dod pa'i gnas thob
T02D3572:204a-18: par 'gyur ro // dpal gyi 'bras bu'i shing gis me rab tu sbar te /
T02D3572:204a-19: mar dang sbrang la bsgres shing dpal gyi 'bras bu'i
T02D3572:204a-20: sbyin sreg 'bum byas pas rgyal po dang blon po
T02D3572:204a-22: autpal la'i sbyin sreg stong byas te mar gyi mar
T02D3572:204a-23: me stong phrag gcig lha mo'i mdun du dbul bar
T02D3572:204a-24: byas na rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'du bar
T02D3572:204a-25: 'gyur ro // ku ru kulle phyag brgyad pa'i sgrub
